sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { AuthService } from 'src/shared/services/auth.service'; import { DistrictsModel } from 'src/shared/models/districts.model'; import { RegionsModel } from 'src/shared/models/regions.model'; import { StoresModel } from 'src/shared/models/stores.model'; import { faList, faHouse, faUser, faBarcode, faRightToBracket, faPlaneUp, faShuffle } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; @Component({ selector: 'reports-section', templateUrl: './reports.component.html' }) export class ReportsComponent { faList = faList; faHouse = faHouse; faUser = faUser; faBarcode = faBarcode; faRightToBracket = faRightToBracket; faPlaneUp = faPlaneUp; faShuffle = faShuffle; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder, private authService: AuthService){ } }
Reports

Order History
History of all orders

Item Purchase Summary
Summary of products ordered

SKUs by Employee
Items by store by employee

Inventory By Part
Current inventory on-hand

Receiving Report
Products that have been received

Shipping Report
Products that have been shipped

Adjustment Report
Inventory Adjustment Report

Billing Report
Shipping and Handling billing for Cinnabon
